entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
